plot: A young woman is kidnapped by a sociopath. After a dangerous escape, DIANE needs to figure out a way back in to save the other girls.
title: Whispers in the Dark
plot_es: A young woman is kidnapped by a sociopath. After a dangerous escape, DIANE needs to figure out a way back in to save the other girls.
plot_en: A young woman is kidnapped by a sociopath. After a dangerous escape, DIANE needs to figure out a way back in to save the other girls.
